Module: AssetsApi

API for interacting with assets.

More info: https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/assets

Methods

<inner> create(params [, callback])

Create a new asset.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params module:AssetsApi~createRequest Parameters for asset creation.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Newly created asset.
Type
Promise.<Asset>

<inner> createBatch(params [, callback])

Create multiple new assets.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params Array.<module:AssetsApi~createRequest> Parameters for creation of multiple assets.
callback batchCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Newly created assets.
Type
Promise.<BatchResponse.<Asset>>

<inner> query(params [, callback])

Get one page of assets matching the specified query.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
params Object {} Filter and pagination information.
Properties
Name Type Description
filter String Filter string, see https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/queries.
filterParams Array.<(String|Number)> Parameter values for filter string (if needed).
pageSize Number Number of items to return in result set.
callback pageCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Requested page of results.
Type
Promise.<Page.<Asset>>

<inner> queryAll(params, processor [, callback])

Request all assets matching the specified query, calling the supplied processor callback with each item individually.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
params Object {} Filter and pagination information.
Properties
Name Type Description
filter String Filter string, see https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/queries.
pageSize Number Number of items to return in result set.
filterParams Array.<(String|Number)> Parameter values for filter string (if needed).
processor QueryProcessor.<Asset> Processing callback.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
A promise resolved upon processing of all items, or rejected on error.
Type
Promise

Type Definitions

createRequest

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Argument Description
alias String <optional>
 User specified, unique identifier.
rootXpubs Array.<String> The list of keys used to create the issuance program for the asset.
quorum Number The number of keys required to issue units of the asset.
tags Object <optional>
 User-specified, arbitrary/unstructured data local to the asset's originating core.
defintion Object <optional>
 User-specified, arbitrary/unstructured data visible across blockchain networks.
